scripts.lint:check: concurrently "cd backend && yarn lint:check" "cd frontend && yarn lint:check"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd backend && yarn lint:fix" "cd frontend && yarn lint:fix"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && yarn test" "cd frontend && yarn test"
scripts.test:cov: concurrently "cd backend && yarn test:cov" "cd frontend && yarn test:cov"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && yarn build" "cd frontend && yarn build && copyfiles build/** ../backend/dist/client
scripts.start: yarn build && cd backend && yarn start
